executable.title: Magically remove objects from the image
executable.description: Given an image and a label map region it will remove the labeled region using a texture synthesis approach

image.name: inputLabelFilename
image.label: Input label image
image.description: Input labeled image with 0 for background and objects with l > 0

image.name: inputMaskFilename
image.label: Input mask image
image.description: Input mask image with 0 for background and 1 for region of interest

boolean.name: lumFilter
boolean.label: Apply luminance filter transformation to input, i.e., the input is a .jpg
boolean.description: Set if input image in jpg format or png etc.

integer-vector.name: radiusVector
integer-vector.label: Radius of the neighborhood
integer-vector.description: The size of the neighborhood patch in the image to build the KD-tree and do the texture synthesis

integer-vector.name: radiusMedian
integer-vector.label: Radius for the median filter (smoothing) that is applied at the end
integer-vector.description: The size of the neighborhood radius

integer.name: maxSamples
integer.label: Maximum number of random samples to averege during final stage
integer.description: The maximum number of random samples per pixel to average for the final stage

integer.name: distanceStep
integer.label: Distance step
integer.description: Step of algorithm moving inward during the filling process

image.name: outputImageFilename
image.label: Output label image
image.description: Write the output of detected objects in the image
